question: 伝統的
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Transmit</kanji>s the feeling of wanting to <kanji>unite</kanji> behind something. What do people unite behind, if they're all part of a similar people? Tradition. Add <ja>的</ja> on there and you have <vocabulary>traditional</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
